articles.title: Biobank-scale inference of ancestral recombination graphs enables genealogical analysis of complex traits - Nature.com
articles.description: ARG-Needle is a method to infer genome-wide genealogies from large-scale genotyping data that can be used in association analyses. Applied to UK Biobank data, genealogy-based testing finds more trait associations than using imputed genotypes.
articles.content:
ARG-Needle and ASMC-clust algorithms
